short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and use different versions of custom instructions for ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Full Control of Your ChatGPT Custom Instructions.
This extension will help you to use Custom Instructions in ChatGPT in a more flexible way.
In practice it may be necessary to have different Custom Instructions for different situations and scenarios: for language learning, for cooking, for work, etc.
It would be great to keep different Custom Instructions easily accessible and switch between them quickly and easily. Unfortunately, ChatGPT only allows you to have one version of Custom Instructions.
This extension is intended to solve this problem. Now you can create, store and easily access a library of your Custom Instructions using a convenient functionality side pannel.
With help of this extension you can:
1. Create an unlimited number of new sections in your library, each containing "About me" and "How to respond" fields
2. Fill these items either manually or by copying the corresponding content from Custom Instructions ("Update library from ChatGPT")
3. Fill in the fields ChatGPT Custom Instructions by copying the corresponding content from your library ("Copy CI to ChatGPT")
